text: Hai you yixie ren, tamen xiujian qingzhensi de mudi shi fanghai chuanjiao, zengjia bu xin he fenlie xinshimen, bing ba ta zuowei yiqian dishi an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de renmen de yige maifu suo. Tamen biding fashi:“Women de yongyi que shi hao de.” Dan an la zuozheng tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
